ModMetaData.name: LED Technology
ModMetaData.author: Piotr Kula
ModMetaData.description:
A pack consisting of LED Technology. [Version 0.8]
* LED Strip (8W) * LED Corner Strip (8W) * LED 45 Degree Spot Light (25W) * LED Security Light (50W) * LED Hydroponics (100W)
Licensing This mod and any code is part of Creative Commons.
Textures Custom textures created specifically for this mod package may not be reused anywhere without my permission.
Credits Rawcode from Ludeon Forum CCL for 64bit IL Patch Master Bucketsmith from Ludeon Forum
